changelog:
- Makes Bruce Lee’s voice set more complete
- Improves Van Damme’s voice with better lines and removes subtitles, makes him as likely to be used in Paris as Mendola’s voice
- Kong: Restores some lines for that were cut between 2016 and H3 (Thanks to Notex), improves escort and sentry lines, removes 2 (of the many) self “Kong” references
- Hokkaido: “No English” now turned into an SMF option rather than separate download. Does not quite 100% eliminate English from Japanese NPCs
- Better sentry lines for Janus voice set
